eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Pennsylvania; AT 05:25 AM ON SEP 16, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:25 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Test This is a State Wide Required Weekly Test of the Emergency Alert System originating from the Pennsylvania Emergency Management Agency, Harrisburg. This is only a test
